mapper.sql: MacNo, TTC, TakeDate, OilGun, OilCan, OilNo, OpeTime, StockDate, StockTime, OilL, StandardL, EmptyL, HeightTotal, HeightWater, OilTemp, WaterL, Density, DensityStandard, Shift, Remark, TranStatus

MacNo, TTC, TakeDate, OilGun, OilCan, OilNo, OpeTime, StockDate, StockTime, OilL, StandardL, EmptyL, HeightTotal, HeightWater, OilTemp, WaterL, Density, DensityStandard, Shift, Remark, TranStatus,Liter,PumpNo,BackMatchFlag
mapper.insert: insert into oss_daily_TradeInventory (MacNo, TTC, TakeDate, OilGun, OilCan, OilNo,CardNo, OpeTime, StockDate, StockTime, OilL, StandardL, EmptyL, HeightTotal, HeightWater, OilTemp, WaterL, Density, DensityStandard, Shift, Remark, TranStatus ) values (#{macno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ttc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{takedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{oilgun,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oilcan,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{oilno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{stockdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stocktime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oill,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{standardl,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{emptyl,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{heighttotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{heightwater,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{oiltemp,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{waterl,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{density,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{densitystandard,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{shift,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transtatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update oss_daily_TradeInventory
OilCan = #{oilcan,jdbcType=INTEGER},
OilNo = #{oilno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OpeTime = #{opetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
StockDate = #{stockdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
StockTime = #{stocktime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OilL = #{oill,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
StandardL = #{standardl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
EmptyL = #{emptyl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
HeightTotal = #{heighttotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
HeightWater = #{heightwater,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
OilTemp = #{oiltemp,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
WaterL = #{waterl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Density = #{density,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
DensityStandard = #{densitystandard,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Shift = #{shift,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TranStatus = #{transtatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where MacNo = #{macno,jdbcType=INTEGER} and TTC = #{ttc,jdbcType=INTEGER} and TakeDate = #{takedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and OilGun = #{oilgun,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update oss_daily_TradeInventory set OilCan = #{oilcan,jdbcType=INTEGER}, OilNo = #{oilno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OpeTime = #{opetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, StockDate = #{stockdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, StockTime = #{stocktime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OilL = #{oill,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, StandardL = #{standardl,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, EmptyL = #{emptyl,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, HeightTotal = #{heighttotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, HeightWater = #{heightwater,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, OilTemp = #{oiltemp,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, WaterL = #{waterl,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Density = #{density,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, DensityStandard = #{densitystandard,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Shift = #{shift,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TranStatus = #{transtatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where MacNo = #{macno,jdbcType=INTEGER} and TTC = #{ttc,jdbcType=INTEGER} and TakeDate = #{takedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and OilGun = #{oilgun,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT tdi.MacNo, tdi.TTC, tdi.TakeDate, tdi.OilGun, tdi.OilCan, tdi.OilNo, tdi.CardNo,tdi.OpeTime, tdi.StockDate, tdi.StockTime, tdi.OilL, tdi.StandardL, tdi.EmptyL, tdi.HeightTotal, tdi.HeightWater, tdi.OilTemp, tdi.WaterL, tdi.Density, tdi.DensityStandard, tdi.Shift, tdi.Remark, tdi.TranStatus,tda.Liter,tda.PumpNo,IFNULL(tda.BackCanFlag,0) as BackMatchFlag FROM oss_daily_TradeInventory tdi left join oss_daily_TradeAccount tda on tdi.MacNo=tda.MacNo and tdi.TakeDate=tda.TakeDate and tdi.TTC=tda.TTC and tdi.OilGun=tda.OilGun WHERE TranStatus=#{trans,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT tdi.MacNo, tdi.TTC, tdi.TakeDate, tdi.OilGun, tdi.OilCan, tdi.OilNo, tdi.CardNo,tdi.OpeTime, tdi.StockDate, tdi.StockTime, tdi.OilL, tdi.StandardL, tdi.EmptyL, tdi.HeightTotal, tdi.HeightWater, tdi.OilTemp, tdi.WaterL, tdi.Density, tdi.DensityStandard, tdi.Shift, tdi.Remark, tdi.TranStatus,tda.Liter,tda.PumpNo,IFNULL(tda.BackCanFlag,0) as BackMatchFlag FROM oss_daily_TradeInventory tdi left join oss_daily_TradeAccount tda on tdi.MacNo=tda.MacNo and tdi.TakeDate=tda.TakeDate and tdi.TTC=tda.TTC and tdi.OilGun=tda.OilGun WHERE TranStatus=#{trans,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND tdi.Shift is NOT NULL
